channel.title: 眨眼的小星玥 • Posts by "公式" tag

item.title: CMC公式合集
item.description:
# 常用极限

lim⁡n→∞nn=1,lim⁡n→∞an=1(a>0)\lim\limits_{n\to\infty}\sqrt[n]{n}=1,\lim\limits_{n\to\infty}\sqrt[n]{a}=1(a>0) n→∞lim​nn​=1,n→∞lim​na​=1(a>0)

lim⁡n→∞an+bnn=max(a,b)\lim\limits_{n\to\infty}\sqrt[n]{a^ n+b^n}=max(a,b) n→∞lim​nan+bn​=max(a,b)

lim⁡n→0(an+bn+cn3)1n=abc13\lim\limits_{n\to0}(\frac{a^ n+b^n+c^n}{3})^{\frac{1}{n}}=abc^{\frac{1}{3}} n→0lim​(3an+bn+cn​)n1​=abc31​

lim⁡n→∞(1+1n)n=e\lim\limits_{n\to\infty}(1+\frac{1}{n})^n=e n→∞lim​(1+n1​)n=e

# 等价无穷小

au−1∼uln⁡aa^u-1\sim u\ln a au−1∼ulna

(1+u)a−1∼au(1+u)^a-1\sim au (1+u)a−1∼au

# 三角公式

积化和：

sin⁡Acos⁡B=12(sin⁡(A+B)+sin⁡(A−B))\sin A \cos B = \frac{1}{2} (\sin(A + B) + \sin(A - B)) sinAcosB=21​(sin(A+B)+sin(A−B))

cos⁡Asin⁡B=12(sin⁡(A+B)−sin⁡(A−B))\cos A \sin B = \frac{1}{2} (\sin(A + B) - \sin(A - B)) cosAsinB=21​(sin(A+B)−sin(A−B))

cos⁡Acos⁡B=12(cos⁡(A+B)+cos⁡(A−B))\cos A \cos B = \frac{1}{2} (\cos(A + B) + \cos(A - B)) cosAcosB=21​(cos(A+B)+cos(A−B))

sin⁡Asin⁡B=12(cos⁡(A−B)−cos⁡(A+B))\sin A \sin B = \frac{1}{2} (\cos(A - B) - \cos(A + B)) sinAsinB=21​(cos(A−B)−cos(A+B))

差化积：

sin⁡A−sin⁡B=2cos⁡(A+B2)sin⁡(A−B2)\sin A - \sin B = 2 \cos\left(\frac{A + B}{2}\right) \sin\left(\frac{A - B}{2}\right) sinA−sinB=2cos(2A+B​)sin(2A−B​)

sin⁡A+sin⁡B=2sin⁡(A+B2)cos⁡(A−B2)\sin A + \sin B = 2 \sin\left(\frac{A + B}{2}\right) \cos\left(\frac{A - B}{2}\right) sinA+sinB=2sin(2A+B​)cos(2A−B​)

cos⁡A−cos⁡B=−2sin⁡(A+B2)sin⁡(A−B2)\cos A - \cos B = -2 \sin\left(\frac{A + B}{2}\right) \sin\left(\frac{A - B}{2}\right) cosA−cosB=−2sin(2A+B​)sin(2A−B​)

cos⁡A+cos⁡B=2cos⁡(2A+B)cos⁡(2A−B)\cos A+\cos B=2\cos(2A+B)\cos(2A−B) cosA+cosB=2cos(2A+B)cos(2A−B)

三角函数间的转换

1+tan2(x)=sec2(x)1 + tan^2(x)=sec^2(x) 1+tan2(x)=sec2(x)

1+cot⁡2(x)=csc⁡2(x)1+cot⁡^2(x)=csc⁡^2(x) 1+cot⁡2(x)=csc⁡2(x)

arctan⁡a−b1+ab=arctan⁡a−arctan⁡b(a≥0,b≥0)\arctan\frac{a-b}{1+ab}=\arctan a-\arctan b(a\geq 0, b\geq 0) arctan1+aba−b​=arctana−arctanb(a≥0,b≥0)

arctan⁡a+b1−ab=arctan⁡a+arctan⁡b(0≤a≤1,0≤b≤1)\arctan \frac{a+b}{1-ab}=\arctan a+\arctan b(0\leq a\leq 1,0\leq b\leq 1) arctan1−aba+b​=arctana+arctanb(0≤a≤1,0≤b≤1)

# 高阶导数

[ln⁡(1+x)](n)=(−1)n−1(n−1)!(1+x)n[\ln(1+x)]^{(n)}=(-1)^{n-1}\frac{(n-1)!}{(1+x)^n} [ln(1+x)](n)=(−1)n−1(1+x)n(n−1)!​

(1ax+b)(n)=(−1)nann!(ax+b)n+1(\frac{1}{ax+b})^{(n)}=\frac{(-1)^n a^n n!}{(ax+b)^{n+1}} (ax+b1​)(n)=(ax+b)n+1(−1)nann!​

(sinx)(n)=sin(x+n⋅π2)(sinx)^{(n)}=sin(x+n\cdot\frac{\pi}{2}) (sinx)(n)=sin(x+n⋅2π​)

(cosx)(x)=cos(x+n⋅π2)(cosx)^{(x)}=cos(x+n\cdot\frac{\pi}{2}) (cosx)(x)=cos(x+n⋅2π​)

# Taylor 展开

ex=∑k=0nxkk!+o(xn)e^x=\sum\limits_{k=0}^{n}\frac{x^k}{k!}+o(x^n) ex=k=0∑n​k!xk​+o(xn)

ln⁡(1+x)=∑k=1n(−1)k−1kxk+o(xn)\ln(1+x)=\sum\limits_{k=1}^{n}\frac{(-1)^{k-1}}{k}x^k+o(x^n) ln(1+x)=k=1∑n​k(−1)k−1​xk+o(xn)

sin⁡x=∑k=1n(−1)k−1x2k−1(2k−1)!+o(x2n)\sin x=\sum\limits_{k=1}^{n}(-1)^{k-1}\frac{x^{2k-1}}{(2k-1)!}+o(x^{2n}) sinx=k=1∑n​(−1)k−1(2k−1)!x2k−1​+o(x2n)

cos⁡x=∑k=0n(−1)kx2k(2k)!+o(x2n+1)\cos x=\sum\limits_{k=0}^{n}(-1)^k\frac{x^{2k}}{(2k)!}+o(x^{2n+1}) cosx=k=0∑n​(−1)k(2k)!x2k​+o(x2n+1)

11−x=∑k=0nxk+o(xn)\frac{1}{1-x}=\sum\limits_{k=0}^{n}x^k+o(x^n) 1−x1​=k=0∑n​xk+o(xn)

# 曲率

y=f(x):y=f(x):y=f(x):

K=∣y′′∣[1+(y′2)]3K=\frac{|y''|}{\sqrt{[1+(y'^2)]^3}} K=[1+(y′2)]3​∣y′′∣​

x=f(t),y=g(t):x=f(t),y=g(t):x=f(t),y=g(t):

K=∣f′g′′−g′f′′∣(f′2+g′2)32K=\frac{|f'g''-g'f''|}{(f'^2+g'^2)^{\frac{3}{2}}} K=(f′2+g′2)23​∣f′g′′−g′f′′∣​

r=r(θ):r=r(\theta):r=r(θ):

K=∣r2+2r′2−rr′′∣(r2+r′2)32K=\frac{|r^2+2r'^2-rr''|}{(r^2+r'^2)^\frac{3}{2}} K=(r2+r′2)23​∣r2+2r′2−rr′′∣​

曲率半径：R=\frac{1}

# 积分

原函数 积分后的函数
sec⁡x\sec xsecx $\ln \sec x+\tan x $
csc⁡x\csc xcscx $\ln \csc x-\cot x $
tan⁡x\tan xtanx $-\ln \cos x $
cot⁡x\cot xcotx $\ln \sin x $
\sqrt \frac{x}{2}\sqrt{a^2-x^2}+\frac{a^2}{2}arcsin\frac{x}
\sqrt $\fracx}{2}\sqrt{x【2\pm a^2】+\fraca【2】\ln x+\sqrtx【2\pm a^2】 $
1x2±a2\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^2\pm a^2}}x2±a2​1​ $\ln x+\sqrtx【2\pm a^2】 $
1(1+x2)32\frac{1}{(1+x^2)^\frac{3}{2}}(1+x2)23​1​ x1+x2\frac{x}{\sqrt{1+x^2}}1+x2​x​
∫0π2sin⁡2nxdx\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\sin^{2n}xdx∫02π​​sin2nxdx $\frac{(2n-1)}{(2n)}\cdot \frac{\pi}{2} $
∫0π2sin⁡2n+1xdx\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\sin^{2n+1}xdx∫02π​​sin2n+1xdx \frac{(2n)!!}

# 微分

原函数 导函数
tan⁡x\tan xtanx sec⁡2x\sec^2 xsec2x
cot⁡x\cot xcotx −csc⁡x-\csc x−cscx
sec⁡x\sec xsecx sec⁡xtan⁡x\sec x\tan xsecxtanx
csc⁡x\csc xcscx −csc⁡xcot⁡x-\csc x\cot x−cscxcotx
arcsin⁡x\arcsin xarcsinx 11−x2\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}1−x2​1​
arccos⁡x\arccos xarccosx −11−x2-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}−1−x2​1​
arctan⁡x\arctan xarctanx \frac{1}

# 一阶线性微分方程

y′+P(x)y=Q(x)y'+P(x)y=Q(x) y′+P(x)y=Q(x)

y=e−∫P(x)dx[∫Q(x)e∫P(x)dxdx+C]y=e^{-\int P(x)dx}[\int Q(x)e^{\int P(x)dx}dx + C] y=e−∫P(x)dx[∫Q(x)e∫P(x)dxdx+C]

Bernoulii 方程：

y′+P(x)y=Q(x)yny'+P(x)y=Q(x)y^n y′+P(x)y=Q(x)yn

左右同除yny^nyn

# 二阶常系数微分方程

# 齐次

y′′+ay′+by=0λ2+aλ+b=0y''+ay'+by=0\\ \lambda^2+a\lambda+b=0 y′′+ay′+by=0λ2+aλ+b=0

实根：两个不同的实根 λ1\lambda1λ1 和 λ2\lambda2λ2，则通解为：

y=C1eλ1x+C2eλ2xy= C_1 e^{\lambda_1 x} + C_2 e^{\lambda_2 x} y=C1​eλ1​x+C2​eλ2​x

重根：一个重根 λ\lambdaλ，则通解为：

y=(C1+C2x)eλxy=(C_1 + C_2 x)e^{\lambda x} y=(C1​+C2​x)eλx

复根：两个复根 λ=α±βi\lambda= \alpha \pm \beta iλ=α±βi，则通解为：

y=eαx(C1cos⁡(βx)+C2sin⁡(βx))y=e^{\alpha x}(C_1 \cos(\beta x) + C_2 \sin(\beta x)) y=eαx(C1​cos(βx)+C2​sin(βx))

# 非齐次

y′′+ay′+by=f(x)y'' +ay ′+by=f(x) y′′+ay′+by=f(x)

如果f(x)=Pm(x)eλxf(x)=P_m(x)e^{\lambda x}f(x)=Pm​(x)eλx，则假设

y∗=xkQm(x)eλxy^*=x^kQ_m(x)e^{\lambda x} y∗=xkQm​(x)eλx

如果 f(x)=eαxPm(x)cos⁡βxf(x)=e^{\alpha x}P_m(x)\cos\beta xf(x)=eαxPm​(x)cosβx 或f(x)=eαxPm(x)sin⁡βxf(x)=e^{\alpha x}P_m(x)\sin\beta xf(x)=eαxPm​(x)sinβx，则假设

y∗=xkeαx[Rm(x)cos⁡βx+Tm(x)sin⁡βx]y^*=x^ke^{\alpha x}[R_m(x)\cos\beta x+T_m(x)\sin \beta x] y∗=xkeαx[Rm​(x)cosβx+Tm​(x)sinβx]

# Maclaurin 展开

ex=1+x+x22+……+xnn!+……(−∞<x<∞)e^x=1+x+\frac{x^2}{2}+……+\frac{x^n}{n!}+……(-\infty <x < \infty) ex=1+x+2x2​+……+n!xn​+……(−∞<x<∞)

sin⁡x=x−x33!+x55!+……+(−1)n−1x2n−1(2n−1)!+……(−∞<x<∞)\sin x=x-\frac{x^3}{3!}+\frac{x^5}{5!}+……+(-1)^{n-1}\frac{x^{2n-1}}{(2n-1)!}+……(-\infty <x < \infty) sinx=x−3!x3​+5!x5​+……+(−1)n−1(2n−1)!x2n−1​+……(−∞<x<∞)

ln⁡(1+x)=x−x22+x33−……+(−1)n−1xnn+……(−1<x≤1)\ln(1+x)=x-\frac{x^2}{2}+\frac{x^3}{3}-……+(-1)^{n-1}\frac{x^n}{n}+……({\color{Tan} -1<x\leq 1{\color{Peach} {\color{Peach} } } } ) ln(1+x)=x−2x2​+3x3​−……+(−1)n−1nxn​+……(−1<x≤1)

1x+1=∑n=0∞(−1)nxn(−1<x<1)\frac{1}{x+1}=\sum\limits_{n=0}^{\infty}(-1)^nx^n({\color{Tan} -1<x<1} ) x+11​=n=0∑∞​(−1)nxn(−1<x<1)

11+x=1+∑n=1∞(−1)n(2n−1)!!(2n)!!xn(−1<x≤1)\frac{1}{\sqrt{1+x}}=1+\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}(-1)^n\frac{(2n-1)!!}{(2n)!!}x^n({\color{Tan} -1<x\leq 1} ) 1+x​1​=1+n=1∑∞​(−1)n(2n)!!(2n−1)!!​xn(−1<x≤1)

# 积分的奇偶性 + 周期性

∫0πxf(sinx)dx=π∫0π2f(sinx)dx=π∫0π2f(cosx)dx\int_0^\pi xf(sinx)dx=\pi\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}f(sinx)dx=\pi\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}f(cosx)dx ∫0π​xf(sinx)dx=π∫02π​​f(sinx)dx=π∫02π​​f(cosx)dx

∫0πf(sinx)dx=2∫0π2f(sinx)dx=2∫0π2f(cosx)dx\int_0^{\pi}f(sinx)dx=2\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}f(sinx)dx=2\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}f(cosx)dx ∫0π​f(sinx)dx=2∫02π​​f(sinx)dx=2∫02π​​f(cosx)dx

\int_0^{\pi}f(cos)dx=\left\{\begin{array}{**lr**}2\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}f(cosx)dx & &f偶\\0 & &f奇\end{array}\right.

∫−aaf(x)dx=∫0a[f(x)+f(−x)]dx\int_{-a}^{a}f(x)dx=\int_0^a[f(x)+f(-x)]dx ∫−aa​f(x)dx=∫0a​[f(x)+f(−x)]dx

若f(x)f(x)f(x) 以 T 为周期，则 $$\int_a{a+T}f(x)dx=\int_0Tf(x)dx$$
